review: I live in southern Oregon and have been surrounded by smoke and fires allllllll summer. This app was nice because I could see which areas around me had the best air quality, and how the air quality might change throughout the day. We could kind of plan around the bad smoke.

title: Love this app!
review: We live where there are wildfires every year that strongly effect our air quality. This app has been so helpful in validating what we already know (its suuuuuuper smoky) and it also helps us know what to expect with the 7 Day Forecast feature.

title: Air Quality rating
review: This is a fast and easy app to look up it add cities or counties that keep updated ratings of the air quality.  I would like to see wildfire map as to where their are but other than that is a very reliable source of many attributes such as pollens to help guide what is happening.

title: Good information
review: I like that I can place my location and get information on how many particulates are in the air. I’m in the fire areas of Northern California and going outside is a health problem.  My only complaint so far is that I have an iPad and the app won’t turn sideways it only is useable in the book position.

title: Helpful
review: This app helped us on our trip to California. We checked out air conditions of all of the places that we were considering after it was obvious that Yosemite wouldn’t work out. It was easy to use and understand. Thank you!

title: So helpful in Hawaii!
review: This app is very helpful.  Many of our neighbors here on the Big Island have air pollution monitors, and this app always keeps me up-to-date on local air quality as I travel the island.  Some days are better than others - depending on the wind.

title: Only gives limited data from more distant monitoring stations
review:
I guess I got spoiled by the old “air quality“ app. This was a 32 bit app that no longer runs on current iPhones.

With this app, you only get a generalized pollution index. They don’t break the data down in terms of OZone or particulate material. Also, there are other EPA monitoring stations closer to me this that this app cannot find.

title: Smokey skies need a rating!
review: This app has been very helpful to recognize Optimal times for being outdoors and exercising. We have had many fires in CA this summer and the air has reached unhealthy levels often...easy, convenient and you can allow notifications. Even if you’re respiratory and cardiac systems are not compromised poor air quality can impact your health...choose health

title: I don’t trust the measurements
review: When I first started using this app, I was pleasantly surprised that my local air quality was better than I thought. I did start to wonder, however, if the readings might not be accurate. One day when the air quality seemed very poor, this app gave me a measurement of 25-–in the green or “good” zone in the app. I double checked against the AirNow website, which showed much higher levels, in the orange zone above 50, meaning “unhealthy for sensitive groups.“ AirNow more accurately reflected my observation so it makes me distrust this app.

title: Forecast Function Is Nonsense
review: The app looks promising but the AQI forecasting feature is absolute nonsense, and even after just a week you can tell that it has absolutely no predictive functionality as compared to what is actually recorded by contributors’ sensors in real life. I think it would be better to just get rid of the forecast feature unless/until they can make it actually work. Otherwise, they’re just leading people to make life adjustments based on nonsense.

title: Reliable and easy to read
review: I had been going to an online website to check the air quality, but I noticed it didn’t match up with many others or it would be down completely. This app is easy to read and so far has been up every time I’ve checked (which is a lot)

title: Works great!
review: Using consumer reports I got a top rated air purifier for my condo. Unfortunately I was never quite sure when I should switch it on.  After purchasing this indoor air quality monitor that problem is now solved! I see immediate results after switching on my air purifier. When the air is clean I turn off my purifier and extend the life of my filter and reduce noise in my room.

title: Beautiful to look at, easy to use
review: I’ve been checking this app every morning to see if it’s safe to let the kids go outside to play. Sad that this is probably our new normal in August, but at least I can see when it will pass (by day and hour) or use the map to see where we could travel to for some clean weekend air.

title: Clear as can be
review: This app is crystal-clear in presenting information. I appreciate the ability to compare locations/sites, it offers a great valuable perspective about 'how bad' the pollution is. We will probably be using this to help weigh where we will live next (and wish we'd had it to figure out how bad the pollution we are dealing with now is before we got here.)

title: Love this app! Scientifically based. Very useful!
review: I love this app! If you explore it you’ll see it has some really wonderful information that helps you understand air-quality and how it’s affected by the winds. I use this app to predict the likelihood of bad air-quality in my area and was able to make travel arrangements that were supported by staying in clean air. A real lifesaver!

title: Game changer
review: I can’t believe I’ve gone so long living in one mega city after the next without paying close attention to the air quality fluctuations. Now I coordinate my outdoor workouts and times to open the windows for fresh air with what’s going on in my city—very usual tool to feel better and avoid unnecessary exposure to high volumes of airborne pollutants.

title: This is a must-have app
review:
Love having the air quality at my fingertips. When there was heavy smoke from the fires, My family could adjust our outdoor activities based on the air index. 
You can also look up any major city around the world and compare the quality of the air - useful if you are planning a trip or are just curious.

title: Air quality from any country
review: The app when outside your home country will pick up on the place you are at and tell the pm2.5. At home it quickly assesses the air quality and I know when to turn on the air purifier. It is very helpful.

title: Great heads up
review: My kids both have respiratory issues and this is a great tool to help us know when it is and is not going to be safe for them to enjoy a lot of typical kid stuff in a particular area we may be visiting or near our home.

title: Very helpful for California fire season!
review: Up to date information, great map feature, past data, and future trends. You can see pockets of bad air quality and the forecast of what the AQI will be in your area. Must have app for everyone

title: Helps tremendously with a newborn
review: Living in Los Angeles, we are heavily reliant on this app for deciding whether to be out for “fresh” air. Thanks for this invaluable resource. I have been an iPhone user since 2007. This is the first time I have felt compelled to review an app. Which speaks to how grateful for it. Thanks again.

title: Sorry. I’m going to delete.
review: I have asthma and I live in Southern California. I got the app to help monitor and regulate my medication. I checked every day to see my conditions. I found it odd when we had a terrible wildfire ( still burning ) and it still showed my air quality as good. When I reached out the representatives were very nice. They responded timely. But, they told me that the data is estimated in my area. So, in other words it’s useless.  I hope to find an app that actually works.

title: Quick and easy air quality reports
review: Easy to understand reports! We're using it in the Nepal region to check for AQI. Does not have all the cities and regions however. Wish they pushed for more air quality testers in more areas.

title: Wish I had this app 2 years ago
review: Moved to South Korea two years ago and the first year was totally oblivious to just how bad the air is on a day by day basis.  This app was an eye opener to just how bad the particulates can be.  Now it’s easy to monitor every time before going out.

title: Breathe Easy
review: This is a handy app to have, especially if you live in a place with poor air quality like me. It’s user friendly and the information and graphics are clear and easy to understand.

title: This is very helpful
review: I started using this app during the Camp Fires in California. The air quality was in the purple range for 2+ weeks. Now, it shows me the air quality is in the green range most days. I know when/if I need a mask or should stay in the house!

title: Very useful app
review: But, that top header, which background color is not match with iOS header background color looks ugly, pls guys do something. )) And that navigation tabs in News & Ranking also looks ugly. Hope you guys can improve UX. Everything else is amazing!

title: Best outdoor smoke detector!
review: I live in the Bay Area and have seen the aftermath of the recent Northern California fires. After downloading this app I know when I need to wear my mask and what activities I should be limiting if any. Really great tool for keeping you up to date on your areas air quality!!

title: Recommend!!
review: I never had to worry about air quality until the wildfire smoke affected my family. I am thankful this app exists because it lets me know when it’s safe to have my little ones outside. Great app! Highly recommend!

title: Helpful during Wildfire
review: After the CA wildfires, the air was unhealthy miles out all over the Bay Area. With other precautions (face masks, humidifier...) this app was easy to use & understand. It seemed pretty accurate. I’ll use it when the sky is clear and when i travel.

title: 3D globe feature is great
review: Ability to see a blend of real-time readings with Satellite data either in list, map or globe form from anywhere in the world. Is your are quality really as good or bad as you think? With this app you will know with greater certainty.

title: Great!
review: Only wish is that there would be an “add/remove” button next to cities instead of the default being that they are automatically added when you click on a city because you want to see details.

title: very informative, great app
review: love using this to check the air quality in my area and whenever I travel. i like that it has the widget option so i can see it in my today view as well on iphone

title: Inaccurate in Medford, OR
review: As I sit here writing this, the smoke from forest fires is so thick it is dangerous to breathe, but the AQI from this app says it is less than 20. The temperatures are also way off.  The Ashland AQI, which is 184 seems closer.  Ashland is about 10 miles away, and in the mountains.  I did send a note to support, and they did respond that they are going to look into the issue.  Hence, 3 stars instead of fewer.

title: Excellent App to check which country is leading us to global warming
review: Excellent App to check which country is leading us to global warming, asthma (PM2.5) and cancer (SO2 and NO2). I constantly look at the map/satellite option. Good App to take care of your and your family’s health. Keep up the good job.

title: Works great especially Thailand
review: Very accurate way to check air quality, even down to the hour of the day. I’ve used it plenty of times internationally as well and finds all locations I’ve ever searched for.

title: Overall great app
review: Very useful information and projections on air quality. One minor recommendation - the news feed doesn’t seem to be updated much - it shouldn’t be too hard to pull together,  collate and link stories of interest from other sites

title: Very helpful
review: As a type 1 diabetic I need to know air quality because my preferred mode of transportation is a bike. If air quality is unhealthy, due to all the fires here in California, I can’t be outside without an N95 mask. It also means I can’t ride. This is extremely important information for me since a fall in to the “sensitive group” because I have a compromised immune system.

title: Great App
review:
Our daughter told us abt this app and I have been using it everyday/ not just once either- 2 and 3 Times. We have had so much smoke and it is greAt to be able to check to see how bad things are. I also like looking at the air quality where friends live or where we are traveling too. 
Great App- highly recommend it.

title: Super accurate forecast
review: This app is the best on the market.  It allows you to view an hour by hour weather and air quality forecast together in one place.  The community section offers some interesting reads for air quality nerds.  And the new design is much improved.  - it's a must have for those of us living in polluted urban environments.

title: Great app!
review:
I love that it gives me the air quality in cities all over the world, it helps me to decide where to go in vacations, how my parents are doing in their city etc. Despite the present COVID-19 crisis I have hope that one day we’ll be able to go places again.

In Watertown he meantime keeping an eye on the air quality we inhale is super important.

title: Great app love it
review:
Really great app I love being able to search around the region to check where the good and bad air quality is located.

I find this very useful because on very poor air quality days I do not exercise, plus I have the ability to change my location to find where air quality is better.

title: Very helpful
review:
This is the most depressing positive review I’ve had to write. During the worst year so far for wildfire smoke on the western coast of the USA, this app has been integral to my family’s management of when to wear face masks, when to stay inside, and when it’s okay to be up and about. 

Thank you for providing this information at such a granular level.

title: Warsaw - one of the most poluted capitals on the planet
review:
The app helps you discover your local air quality and helps you decide between a walk and indoor cycling.

Should be mandatory for Polish polititions who take incredibly slow steps to improve the situations. In 3Q18 Poland was the only country in EU with sales of electric cars down and diesel up. Why not increase taxes on diesel cars? Whe not ban old diesel in cities?

title: Kind of depend on it now
review: We have had smoke from forest fires drifting over us lately. This app makes it easy to determine how good or bad the air to breathe outside is before you go outside and are exposed to it.  It would be nice if they also provide an iWatch app to pair with the iOS app, as well as provide an “alert” feature when bad AQ days are approaching or real time.

title: Literally saving my life and helping me convince others that the Air Quality is important
review: So beautiful and well designed and easy to use and understand it’s actually causing behavior changes in my life.  I can’t immediately control the environment but I can plan for the toxic crises that is the air quality in which I find myself.

title: Simple, helpful app
review: Downloaded this during the wildfires out in NorCal to help assist me on what protective equipment I needed to go outside. It’s a beautiful app that’s easy to use and explains what the air quality ratings mean. I’d definitely recommend it to anyone who’s curious about the air quality near their home & to be able to look at the rest of the world as well!

title: Helpful
review: I live in Los Angeles, and with all the pollution combined with all the recent wildfires, I had been getting really sick from the poor air quality. Now I know when to stay indoors, or when to run the AC and air purifier instead of opening the windows.

title: Keep my air clean
review: I’m someone with respiratory problems. This app is my quick look at the air quality before I go out. There have been occasions when the air quality has changed my plans. Thanks for helping me breathe!

title: A MUST HAVE. With rapidly changing climate change happening.
review: If you can see what is going on around you.    You can take the steps to control your own house hold air quality. Plus know what’s happening to love ones in other places.

title: Best air quality app
review: This app is better than the Airmatters app. AirVisual gives live air quality updates all over the globe and India. I highly recommend this app. Now after seeing the air quality issue is what to do to improve the environment.

title: Helpful when needed
review: Works well during seasons of varying air quality. I know when to go out or leave the windows open.  It tells me hour-by-hour what to expect, which is useful during fire season.

title: Denver Colorado
review: Don’t go to Denver Colorado. The fires are bad and they are getting California smoke also. Couldn’t even see the foothills and we were staying with our son in Westminster I wish I would of had this app before we planned to be in Colorado for a whole month. Love this app

title: Very useful
review: This is a very user-friendly, quick and convenient app. It comes in very handy, I use it daily, and it’s better than most of the other air quality monitoring apps that I’ve tried in the past.

title: Add regional infection risk
review: Great app to generate awareness of pollutants that can affect your health. It would be great to add airborne infection risk to viruses in a region based in CDC or other sources. This will be important given potential virus pandemics and could help you to decide whether you want to wear a mask today when going out.

title: So helpful
review:
Since the fires in los angeles, I’ve used this app daily to determine outdoor exercise for me and my kids. I love how it’s so specific to each neighborhood. Amazing. 

It’s also fun (and sometimes horrifying) to compare our situation to other cities around the world.

title: so helpful!
review: Downloaded this app during the wildfires in California a couple years ago and unfortunately have had many occasions since then that it has been essential. Such a great service!

title: Great air quality app!
review: This app makes it so easy to see the air quality wherever you are and also the surrounding areas around you. The map view is my favorite and this app always updates changes in air quality quickly!! With the fires happening in California this app has been incredibly helpful!!

title: Very useful
review: As someone who has a lung disorder, I especially appreciate the heads up on air quality and plan accordingly. And it’s not just good for me, I can also check other locations so I can see the air quality where my grandmother lives. It’s been nice for her to be able to leave her oxygen machine at home for short errands on good air days

title: Fast and Reliable
review: There are several apps available that report air quality. This is my “go-to” app. It is fast, responsive and works well reliably. It launches and updates data quickly. I like how easy it is to compare air quality across various cities around the globe by simply scrolling down. Recommended.

title: Best air quality app
review: Downloaded during the bushfire episodes in Sydney : Air quality was going from good to barely breathable (one of the worst in the world) within hours. I've tried several apps, this one is by far the most well crafted and accurate I've tried. Shared with all my colleagues here and we now all use it.

title: Disappointing and lacking
review:
I was excited to find an app that could help with my allergic asthma, so I downloaded this. While the air quality reporting is amazing, it’s missing a huge component for those with sensitivities! 
...............REAL TIME POLLEN COUNTS...............

I have severe allergies and had to start receiving allergy shots because it is interfering with enjoying life, the outdoors, and being able to open the windows in my home. I have allergic asthma, which is a terrible thing to live with. Yet there is no real time information (or any info at all!) regarding pollen levels. 

You say you want to help people with sensitivities and lung problems become better informed to live a better life; but completely strike out on allergic asthma! Please add this and I will reinstall this app.

title: Great for CA fire season!
review: This is the best thing I’ve found that helps me know how the air quality is right where I am and when it’s likely to shift. It also gives a 7 day forecast and has an awesome map feature to help check out surrounding areas. The most helpful thing I’ve found for air quality and it’s free! Thank you!

title: Super easy to refer to, and use.
review:
I really like this App.  My only complaint is that they don’t have a monitor where we live so I have to refer to other towns and extrapolate, but, that being said, I live in a small town, and the areas I refer to are within a 30 mile radius so it’s not that bad.  
I love the map style that is very easy to discern.  Excellent App overall!

title: If you want to breathe easier, this is your app.
review: Given the fire zone the Northwest has become, I have been struggling to find accurate, up-to-the-moment info about air quality. AirVisual solved my dilemma, while also giving me access to conditions in other places, as well. Now if I could only find a NIOSH mask to fit my face...

title: Literally can’t live (breathe) without it!
review: Though when I first awaken, I already know if it’s a “good or bad air day”, this app is essential as to how, what, when, and how much to do the rest of that day. I can plan how to function, tho maybe limited, or change plans entirely. It’s an actual medical tool, just not dispensed from a physician!

title: Works. Simple as that.
review: It works. Apples weather app has turned off showing the poor air quality in China. Probably because China forced them to. So I needed another way to check and this app has been great. Continue showing the truth about the poor air quality around the world. Help people. Help our environment.

title: Awesome !
review: I have appreciated the Air Monitor since I got it but never more than now as I’m having issues with the air quality in my home. I check the app many times a day which helps me immensely during this stressful time.

title: Go to App for China Air Quality
review: Great app, use it a lot - often multiple times a day to check air quality conditions. Really like the predictions provided for the next few days, in order to assist in planning outdoor activities. 5 stars!

title: Best Air Quality Index App I’ve used so far
review: I’ve tried about 4 apps other than this one and it beats those on multiple fronts. From regular updates (some are often one or more days behind) to worldwide data, this is a keeper.

title: So helpful!
review: I enjoy the various features offered here... great hourly breakdown of air quality, suggestions for conserving health during times of poor quality environments, along with easy images that capture all that’s going on in real time.  Cheers!

title: Perfect
review: We are an outdoor family; hiking, camping, biking, kayaking...and this app has been So helpful during the wildfire season. And It’s so easy to use. I picked it over the others because of how visual it was. Works on our apple watches too. Worth getting for sure!

title: Great App! Includes pollution and weather forecast
review: Sad that even need to download this app. However, it is a great app for pollution and weather forecast. You can follow pollution levels all over the world and it will give you the reading according to where you are.

title: THIS APP IS SO GOOD!!!
review: I find this app really helpful and educational when dealing with air quality. I’ve never really paid much attention before but now I know how bad it can really get and affect you. With this app, I’ve gained more knowledge about the human body and it’s environment.

title: Great, but where’s Palestine?
review: This app does a good job of giving scientific information, however it fails to recognize the independence of Palestine. Nowhere on the map does it mention Palestine, only Israel. Please fix this. You might wonder what the relevance of this is in an app about air quality, but isn’t air quality about human rights? Palestine should be included too.

title: Pretty Good
review: It is quite helpful app. Seems to work ok (no bugs I am aware of). It would be nice if the app would switch to landscape orientation when the iPhone or iPad are in landscape orientation. It would be nice if you could select a particular city as your default city (favourites would be nice as well).

title: Love it!
review: Since I moved away from the USA I was concerned about air quality for me & my family as we are in an environment that gets a lot of dust and pollution. This app is great to track air quality anywhere in the world. So happy once I started using this app.

title: Helps me plan my days and travel
review: Love the app.  I can see what the air quality is hour by hour, which helps plan outdoor activities like when to walk to work or go for a bike ride.  We use it to know when to open the windows and air our the house.  And I love to see what the air is like when I’m on the road.

title: Valuable information, easy to read
review: With its clean user interface, AirVisual gives you the information you need on air quality, wind direction and strength, and forecast. Being able to see a map and see time lapse of pollutants enables you to plan and make the healthiest choices for your family.

title: Drained my Apple Watch battery in half a day.
review:
Hey guys, I appreciate your hard work with keeping the app up to date and adding features. 

However, I tested out your new Watch Complication in my Infograph watchface on my S4 watch and I noticed that the location icon (white background, right-turn arrow) always displayed on my ᴡᴀᴛᴄʜ all day since I activated the Complication and also led to the watch rebooted itself later that afternoon to noticed that my watch had lost >60% battery in 8 hours since last full charge !

After I remove your complication from my watch, battery level is back to normal. While I’m no where technical; your complication is the only thing that I made change to my watch in weeks. It can only mean one thing. 

I hope the details will help your team with finding a solution.

title: Alerts come in dependability
review: Air Quality alert come in on my phone banner which makes it very easy for me to know what the air-quality is on current date and for the next day. No need to go hunting for the information. It’s been good data also coinciding with what it seems like outside and not off-base

title: Excellent app -
review:
Overall simple, with well represented information.
Borders on becoming visually too informative - hope it doesn’t go the way of the weather channel app which is now just way too much info.

Although links to health and science info and updates on state of different situations such as the BC forest fires could be useful.

title: Manda541
review: This app is extremely helpful, especially with all the smoke from the forest fires. I feel more confident when I choose to let my two babies go outside to play....and some days we won’t even run errands because I don’t want them outside AT ALL when the air quality is reading 300 (or even 150...).

title: App is really good
review:
I have double checked the air quality showing on this app with other pollution monitors and it is consistent with all the other dad out there. This app is really easy to use and has worked well for me.

The interface complication for Apple Watch series 4 does not work yet but the phone app works great

title: Accurate and thorough
review: With the current air quality situation with all the fires it’s difficult to know what the air quality really is and what future projections will be. This app not only syncs with AirNow but it shows projected air quality which has helped us plan our outings around the times and areas with the best air quality.

title: Has helped improve my health
review: I fall into the “sensitive groups” category, due to allergies and asthma.  I love to run outside, and this app helps me schedule my outdoor activity in relation to the air quality.  It also helps me understand when it’s best to stay inside, to avoid poor air quality.  Great app- the visualization feature is wonderful as well.

title: Survival
review:
Working and living in South Korea is a joy EXCEPT for the air quality.

While I can survive with irritated eyes, my wife is most sensitive to the air quality which is sadly lacking due to Yellow Dust from the Gobi Desert as well as industrial pollution making its way from China.

We depend on the app daily to determine the extent of our outdoor exposure as well as turning on our indoor air filters.

title: Save My Life
review: This app is wonderful.  It tells me if the air quality is something I should be worrying about.  It also gives me a warning of upcoming bad air quality. Literally is help saving my life as I have Mast Cell Activation Disease that is triggered by large particulates in the air.

title: Really good solid useful app
review: Relatively easy to use and completely free. Haven’t run into any ads. Really coming in handy with the smoke from the wildfire. Having an air quality app is pretty important at this point if ur in California like I am and this is a really good free one.

title: Very helpful
review: Living in the SF Bay Area after the horrible Camp fire destroyed the homes and killed people in Paradise, it also made our air quality the worst in the world for well over a week. This app helped on a daily basis to decide to wear N95 masks and to seek places to travel to, just so we, and our dog, could breathe and get some exercise.

title: Being aware
review: If you have any health issues or family that does... or just want to see what’s going on anywhere... this is the app for you! Lots of options and info in diff formats available.

title: A must for asthmatics
review: This helpful app gives you all the information you need to make decisions on whether or not to go out during poor air quality times. During the fires in CA, it was extremely valuable. It even has a 7-day forecast so you can plan accordingly.

title: Doesn’t update to actual day
review:
The idea of this app grows more important every day. However, the data is not current. For example, today is Sunday, September 2, and the most current data that appears is from Thursday, August 30.
How can this be valuable to me ‘daily’ if the actual data doesn’t appear ‘daily’? I don’t want to know what it was like three days ago. I’m concerned about ‘real time data’.

title: Helpful - limited
review: I use this all the time to check on the air. Most of the time the “current” air quality is from an hour or two before. I’ve taken my kids out in “good” quality air only to find when it updates it was “moderate” or “unhealthy”

title: Great information!
review: Easy to use and understand. I get all the information I need at a glance. I especially like the feature that I can type in a different location then my neighborhood.

title: Great for asthmatics!
review: This app has been a great tool for me to monitor the air at work (Texas Medical Center, Houston). I just hope more air monitoring stations were available in West Houston. Would also be great if a description of PM or AQI was given and components and percentage of particulates that make up the AQI number.

title: Amazing coverage
review: I travel all the time and exercise outside when I can do this app is great to check air quality no matter where I go. I’m amazed at how many areas are covered. Super helpful if you have health issues or exercise.

title: Fantastic
review: Super clean interface(no pun 🙃), real time, 7-day forecasts with multi-locations. Articles if you want them but nothing clutters this app. I’m motivated now to buy their device to contribute to world map—and that map! Outstanding. Cannot like this app more

title: Really helpful
review: So easy to see exactly what the air quality is near you. I’m in a “sensitive group” (respiratory issues) and during the fires in northern California this November, AirVisual helped me decide whether or not to stay indoors. (Usually the answer was yes.) I would wake up each morning and check it first.

title: Thank you
review: Having instant access to critical information that affects my families quality of health is vital. We have fewer incidents of poor breathing when we can make our plans around the best times to be out and about.

title: Kona air
review:
We live on the Big Island, HI. Currently we are dealing with very variable air quality problems and I find the app very helpful. 
It is the first app I  check when I wake up in the morning and the last app I check before I go to sleep at night.

title: Just does what it should
review: AirVisual shows reliable air quality info, updated hourly (here in Korea).  The map feature is nice and so far has worked without any hiccups. Looks well-designed and thought out. Worth a look!

title: Great app
review: This app helps my family a lot. We live in a city that is near refineries and I have friends that have gotten lung cancer. Technology like this helps my son who is asthmatic and I wear a mask when we have to. If we want clean bottled water why not clean air?

title: Would be five stars if I could get notifications to work
review: I love that the app used your location and gives you projections for air quality up to 72 hours in advance. I asked for notifications to be sent every morning but it doesn't work. Please fix!

title: Extremely helpful
review: This app has been very helpful in managing our itinerary to Australia during the bushfires of 2020. So glad we found it. We’ll use the app wherever we go in the future as well as for use at home.

title: Air quality
review: Great app. I wouldn’t mind if there were suggestions of things to do if air quality is poor. Maybe even links to services or items to purchase.

title: Says air is “good” during thick LA fires!!!
review: I used to love and trust this app.. recently I noticed it was giving info that was way off from what other air quality sources were posting. I was unsure which to believe until this past Saddleridge fire in north Los Angeles. The city was full of thick black smoke that smelled like chemicals, caused burning eyes and heart palpitations and this app says that the API is 46 and good!! The smoke lasted for over 2 days and it never mentioned it. Get EPA AIRNow for ACCURATE air quality info and save your health.

title: Great heads up for bronchiectasis patients!
review: This app has been an awesome tool in my treatment plan. This is allowing me to monitor air quality and adjust my meditations and plans! Living in Southern California, I face fire danger and smoke pollution every Santa Ana wind event. Thank you for giving pulmonary patients more options in self care. I highly recommend this app for all pulmonary patients!

title: Great app for allergies or asthma
review:
I like this app.

Having the reading close to my neighborhood is very helpful for my breathing sensitivity. When I moved here there was little traffic. Now it is constant. Useful app and they still allow it to be free, a rare plus in these days of frequent apps. They download free, but charge to use them. 5 stars for this app.

title: I depend on this app!
review: The basic air quality website isn’t precise enough to give me relevant information, and I don’t get updates the way I do from Air Visual. I strongly encourage anyone to get this app. We all need to take the right steps to be safe in a world in which air quality crises are becoming much more common.

title: One confusing quirk, but otherwise great app
review: Really love the next notifications each morning and when things are getting better or worse.  The only funny thing is it seems to mislabel the days on the forecast, so today is Tuesday, and then there’s another Tuesday before Wednesday and Thursday, etc. 🧐

title: It really helps to see the situation visualized
review: While the data in the forecast is not always correct, anymore than any other weather forecast is correct, it's really helped me to use this app this week while we continue suffering through our seventh week of hazardous air in Southern Oregon. Thank you.

title: Fantastic
review: It is amazing how this app has had an impact on our household.  I used the app for a year and then with all the fire smoke, decided to purchase a pro.  Needless to say, we had no idea of what little air impacts can do to ones health.  The Pro decide is a lot of fun and it also is a safety feature.  I recommend this product and app to anyone.

title: Smart, Simple, Attractive
review: What a great idea to build an open source community to help people understand the air quality they are breathing.  Air quality is a growing concern around the planet.  The air you breath is just as important as the water you drink in my opinion.  This app is driving me to purchase the IQ Air sensor to go with my home air filter unit.

title: Great Tool - Chiang Mai, Thailand
review: This app has been an easy way to get a reading on both the air quality in our neighborhood and in the city overall. The number of reporting stations in larger cities around the world is impressive. 12 just in Chiang Mai, a city of just 1M people. And bonus, a station just about 1 km from our home.

title: Very Helpful for Air Quality
review: I like it that it’s easy to add different cities to check regularly, so you can keep tabs on the air quality anywhere in the world that you’re interested in. And the local report helps you know when it’s OK to keep the windows open or exercise out of doors.

title: Love this app
review: This is a great app to use to check the air quality in the ROK. It’s easy to use and I can check the air quality by just looking at the app icon on my home screen and without actually clicking on it. You can also allow it to sent you alerts. I highly recommend this app.

title: Good to go
review: This is perfect to have it setup with notifications on so a remote plug can turn the HealthPro Plus on and off at certain set points. It’s taken the guess work out having to see how healthy or unhealthy our sons room is.

title: Love the app
review: It’s so useful for everywhere I am. Pretty accurate because the air in korea at times looks awful and the numbers on the app are right on even when it’s clear the number seem correct.

title: Very helpful app
review: I’m really glad that I downloaded this particular application. I appreciate the information and the way in which is presented. I also appreciate the forecasts and the notifications of the air quality.

title: Very informative, easy to use, accurate!
review: Northern Californian here with wildfire smoke causing school closures. I like this app because it shows multiple locations from different regions, it shows hourly and weekly forecasts, and gives advice on how to protect your health.

title: Good to have this data
review: I use this app often and also ask my students to download and use in my environmental science course.  The data is super helpful and prompts lots of discussion about particulates and other air pollutants.

title: Inconsistent updates and weird day-of-week bugs
review: It basically does the job, but the forecasts always seem to be a day behind, and all week it’s been reporting good air quality when the air is full of smoke. It’s not obvious how to select or add stations, so if you only use the app occasionally you’re at the mercy of whatever it auto-picks.

title: Very useful app
review: Helpful to know when to limit exposure to outdoors for those of us with sensitivity to air quality. It also helps me to better understand my poor sleep pattern due to poor air quality.

title: I don’t plan my day without it!
review: I’m coming from overseas and the air quality was a huge concern. This app makes it so easy... having the weather and air information all in one convenient place!!

title: PG&E is the reason why this was installed
review: PG&E is responsible for the largest US forest fire. Guess what? It's a publicly traded company. They should go bankrupt, just like if my company burned down California. Now I have to use this app bc PG&E couldn't do their job right. Good app, wish I didn't have to use it tho.

title: Pretty awesome app I wish everyone had
review: This app is a must use for everyone not just those worried about asthma or respiratory issues; we are all affected by pollution and crap in the air. I highly recommend this app for everyone in my life.

title: Perfect 👍
review: What a great app , beautiful design, useful handling , perfect information 👍 5 stars and high recommended. What I miss ? Only 1 thing , a complication for the Siri watchface , it would be so cool when I see t by rough the day some cards with the air data on my Siri watchface 👍 any chance for this feature? Keep working on this app ist a 5 Star app 👍

title: Wonderful App and Appliance
review: Ensuring your air is clean, fresh and healthy is a pleasure with this app and the corresponding Pro appliance. Both are very user-friendly, high-performing and attractive. I would highly recommend this to anyone who is concerned about their health. We have identified key times when are home is filled with CO2, and have taken remedies to resolve.

title: Great app - more weatherings?
review: Great app, always updates perfectly.. jst curious if they will include some added features?  Just as a simple user I’d like to know more about precipitation (its affects etc) humidity (its affects etc) and levels in your area + of course smog pollution - news on masks etc. Would be nice, again just added features. Nonetheless, loving air visual ~ keep up the great work!

title: Very useful, especially around bad air days
review: The number of local air quality stations is wide in the CA Bay Area, but there are still gaps in areas with no monitors.  That should improve over time, as the monitors only cost $250 and a lot of people are buying them.  The world map view is difficult to use and does not provide boundaries or crosshairs to orient the user’s location.

title: Just what I need
review: This app has the info I am looking for in a very easy to use interface. Some nice features to stay in top of what is happening so we can plan accordingly when fire season is in full affect. Really like the map feature to help us know where to go to catch a break from the smoke.

title: Terrific App
review: I have asthma and I use this app to help me plan my days. It allows me to see what the air quality is so I can make educated decisions about my day and work. Being an avid cyclist it also tells me when I need to hook the bike up to the trainer instead of going outside. Managing my asthma is much easier with this app.

title: Solid App
review: Living in the Middle East, this app has really changed my lifestyle and habits. I bought an air purifier right away after discovering how bad the air was in Riyadh where I am currently living. It is good to receive updates, so that I know when to exercise outside and when to stay in as much as possible.

title: Very helpful!
review: This has become my main source of air quality information while we’re dealing with lots of smoke in Southern Oregon.  It’s easy to use and is updated regularly.  I do wish that if had information for a greater number of cities, though, such as the cities on Oregon’s southern coast.

title: Good app, much more stable
review:
This app has significantly improved since I last used it during last year’s fire season. This year, it is much more stable, and information is more nicely presented. And it is easy to delete/change favorites!

I find this app indispensable to monitoring air quality when smoky air blows in from near (or even not so near) forest fires.

title: Great, but...
review: Use it with my AirVisual Pro and it works great. But I hate that every time I open the app it bumps my devices down in favor of my current location. Even deleting my current location, it comes back later and pushes my devices down again. I want to see my devices first, which is why I got them. Please stop messing with my order.

title: Does exactly as described: gives detailed info on air quality anywhere I am
review: I live in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia, which is behind only China and India in terms of air pollution and so far AirVisual is the only application that specifically states what sources they use to display AQI. I use it every time I go out to check if I need to wear a respirator mask.

title: Check This and the Weather App Daily
review: Living in a very polluted country means that I need to check the air quality on a regular basis to see if I need a mask, need to limit outdoor activity, or need to turn on my air purifier. This app is efficient and reliable, and I really like the air quality forecast as well.

title: Helpful for planning time outdoors but could use more reference points
review: I like to use the app to plan my running and yard work so that I can try to only be out on healthy air days. I’d love to see more readout locations since there seem to not be very many in my area on this app, but other websites have a lot more info. Not sure the logistics on that though!

title: Not Certain Of Accuracy but Solid App
review: Live in Thailand and the government doesn’t report PM 2.5 numbers. Many of this app’s source points also only show PM 10. Hard to know if it’s accurate or not. One school nearby has 3 sensors checking PM 2.5 and they are all wildly different. Perhaps it’s correct. Perhaps not. Still better than nothing. Needs a portrait mode for iPad too.

title: A must have app if you want to breathe
review: Great well built app - allows you to know the air quality where you are headed and on an hourly forecasted basis - so you can decide when to run outside and when to go the gym - also shows non biased internet sourced data so you get the unvarnished numbers !

title: Young children
review: I am a nanny and I work with a one year old and it is so important to me and his family that he is not outside when the air is bad. The day after the fourth of July, the air had a blue glow to it, turns out the air was rated at 177!! Worse then I have ever seen. Thanks to this app I know when to play indoors

title: Helps me plan my day
review: I live in Chiang Mai, Thailand. During the dry season it is hard to know from one day to the next what the air quality will be.  Being sensitive to dust and smoke, I need to know if it is a good idea to try to venture outdoors. Air Visual accurately gives me hourly updates for my area. I have grown to depend on this report. Thank you!

title: Very Useful & Full Function
review: This fire season has been the worst yet for the northwest & sent me looking for better air quality info than our local weather report gave. I was pleased to find AirVisual. Easy to get started with, a logical interface, & lots of location features. Good job!

title: Accurate & crowdsourced
review: The air quality data updates hourly. The data is crowdsourced, so you can get very accurate information based on your location! It also includes guides to help you plan your daily activities around air quality!

title: My airVisual Monaco
review: So far I like the app very interesting very nice to know how the air is in other places I travel a lot so I am going to use it a lot. It is good to know how the air is in the places you are going to thank you for inventing this monitor I will keep you up-to-date on the monitor efficiency till next time.

title: Intriguing information
review:
I've used this for a few months. No episodes of really bad air in that time but nice to see good vs moderate

There are 3 stations within 4 miles, and their numbers often differ. But that is not the fault of this app.

title: Very helpful app
review: So useful, especially when your town is surrounded daily by wildfire smoke.  I like that I get to see a forecast in my town but then I can also quickly scroll down to check out neighboring towns.

title: Helpful forecasts
review: If you work or play outdoors this app is for you. Quick and accurate forecasts to help you check your local air quality. HT to all the people maintaining air monitoring stations with open data.

title: Very helpful
review: 4 stars instead of 5 because I’m finding it somewhat challenging to navigate and also it doesn’t give a reading for all places. Suggested nearby locations would be helpful, otherwise you just have to keep stabbing in the dark.

title: Love the app
review: Love the app it is very accurate live in Florida the air can get pretty thick down here especially during the summer time also have to deal with wild fires down here as well so very useful for sure keep up the good work guys

title: Use this all the time
review: Great app for tracking air quality locally and when traveling. I live in Southeast Asia 6 months every year where air quality has its seasonal VERY BAD periods.  Nice to know the actual particulate numbers instead of guessing.

title: My Go To
review: I use this app daily to check air quality in my area. It’s interesting to see how many days are over 50. Today, with wildfires raging north of me, the air quality is already 233 at 10 am this morning.

title: Great app for monitoring local air quality
review: Air visual has the best data for local air quality.  It’s a must have app if you live in an area where fires or pollution frequently make it impossible to be outdoors.  It’s as important as the weather.

title: Works great in my area, South Korea
review: Been checking it against other data sources for about three weeks. It is better than most of them. Also, easier than listening to the radio.

title: Great app but needs to be fixed
review:
What I love about this app.
I can see the air quality on the app icon without even opening it up.
They have a forecast of air quality (not already accurate but they try)

What are some problems. When I open the app for a daily forecast it will show 3 days.  Since today is Saturday the 8th I'll use that as my example.
I will see Saturday Saturday Sunday. When I focus on the first Saturday it will say Saturday the 7th (which is actually a Friday). So now I'm confused... Is the air quality I'm seeing for Friday? Or Saturday? I don't know so I'll need to check somewhere else that has accurate data.

title: Super useful!
review: During our heavy smoke in Western Washington, I was using this app every day, multiple times. Really helpful and beautiful too (the air movement map in particular.) I will continue using it to check AQ and it reall helps me see air movements. Well done!

title: Reliable and accurate!
review: This is our “go to” for family and at work. Living in a valley between 2 mountain ranges provides lots of seasonal air quality issues and a this ap allows us to be prepared, for all ages!

title: Good for checking ozone levels
review: Good for checking ozone levels in Tucson, AZ. The program seems accurate because there are wildfires in the distance and it is giving an "unhealthy for sensitive groups" warning in the area by the fire.

title: Pretty good
review: In short, it’s a fair app, delivers numbers that are relevant without much interface getting in the way. Could be improved with some more attention to simplifying the interface and improving the fonts to be more pronounced, maybe black typefaces on the colored backgrounds?

title: A sigh of relief
review: Knowing the details of the air quality and weather in various places has been a real relief during this fire season in California. The display is easy to understand and the app is easy to navigate.

title: Helpful
review: Even though I couldn’t find my exact location I found somewhere with in 5 miles and I could check during the Butte County fire. It was very interesting to compare different location levels of toxicity in the air

title: Great app
review: I am so happy that I got this app. Now I can look up the weather, check if it safe to walk outside and all the suggestions that app give to each of the air conditions. I really like this app. Thanks for creating it.

title: Helps me out while I’m working abroad.
review: I haven’t had issues with my lungs since I was a young child but once I came to Korea, I found it hard to breath. This app helps me know when I need to put my mask on and try to save my lungs lol

title: Helps me get ready for the day
review: This app is pretty accurate and gives me an idea of how to go about my day just like if I was going to check the weather? Is it going to rain? Yep, got my umbrella. Is the aqi higher than 50? Nope, I don’t need my N95 mask.

title: Very helpful
review: The AirVisual app for iPhone has been very helpful for easily accessing AQI for my city and other areas when I travel. It is quick and accurate and I appreciate the apps settings that provide alerts.

title: I love it
review: This product has changed my life.  I think I understand why among other attributes I grew such thick long eye lashes as a little child.  I owe it this monitor.  It’s helping me to learn why I can live better than I have or do given any time.

title: Love the app
review: Gives you details of any city around the world, and even around different areas in the same city. You can create alarms and it is very user friendly. Totally recommend it.

title: JJ7
review: This is a good app for people who like to preview the air pollution each day and night at the area or where they want to know before the trip so that can prepare what clothes or medical equipment they need to bring for the travel, especially for those people who got sick like asthma problem.

title: Very helpful
review: Enables me to see the air quality where I am and anywhere I might be going. I appreciate the notifications of daily air quality, and the forecast so I can try to plan ahead.

title: Very useful air monitoring app
review: We live in Ho Chi Minh City with 2 little kids that like to play outdoors. The app helps us to decide when kids better play inside and when to turn up our air filters at home.

title: Good app, lots of features and useful data coverage
review: This app is fantastic for what it is: provide a glimse of air quality around you. It is great for what it does, the best of all, it is part of a meaningful movement, for that alone I would rate this 5 stars.

title: Love this app!
review:
After the fires in Butte County, the San Francisco Bay Area was blanketed with smoke for days. I downloaded this app to watch for unhealthy days and know when it was safe to open my windows and play outside again. 

Extremely useful and accurate.

title: Vital info for people who breathe
review: The app provided easy updates as smoke from wildfire shifted across N Cal for weeks. Current and forecast data seems really good, aligned with the haze we saw. Google Earth tool shows particulate concentration and prevailing wind and looks great when it works. Server got overwhelmed. Recommended app.

title: Great app.  Needs more locations.
review: Great app.  It would be great if you have more locations and validation of data points. For example, I think there is someone near my house that has an indoor monitor. That point is always green regardless of all the other data around it.

title: Misleading
review: Huge problem with this app is that the location of monitors affects the air quality data. I am currently in a city where supposedly the air is fine according to the app. In fact, in the downtown area the air is horrible. At a minimum, the position of monitors should be identified and the potential variation in AQ in a city clearly stated. For someone with COPD or asthma it is actually dangerous to rely on this data as it is currently presented.

title: Useful and accurate
review: There’s another app I’ve used that is consistently 1-3 hours old in it’s readings, which makes it useless for deciding if you want to go outside NOW. This app is specific, accurate and useful.

title: Wildfire Areas
review: I live in an area where smoke from wildfires seems to have an affect on our daily lives. It’s nice to have a resource to check on the air each day and up to the hour for planning events

title: So helpful!
review: This is my go-to app to monitor air quality in my local area. It’s very informative and I like the features which allow me to get a broader perspective of what’s going on, beyond my local area, and I enjoy the forecasts as well.

title: Perfect for me!
review: Having asthma, I need to know the air quality, especially since we live in Maui and are 150 miles from the volcano eruption and deal with the vog. This software does the job in keeping me aware of the air quality.

title: Excellent information
review: Assuming this data is accurate, this is a great tool. Allows you to be aware of important information affectingly your health.  Does choose the wrong location sometimes.

title: Handy
review: I enjoy the presentation of the data in map form. I would like to be able to view it in its entirety - currently the levels cover each other. It’s difficult to click on them. I do like seeing the list view as well.

title: Helpful App
review: Lots of places where one can see the current air quality. You may have to know the province or state if wanting to find data on a particular city.

title: Useful as an expat
review: Never had to be mindful of the air pollution in my city before and this app makes it very easy. I don’t change my behavior really but it just nice to know how much more quickly I will die

title: The air quality app you don’t want to miss
review: Easy to use, reliable data, good forecast, and overall plenty of data for decision making. Highly recommend.

title: Good for air quality
review: Good to see what the Air quality is at a glance. The icons and information are easy to understand. I do wish I could see the area easily so that I could what the air quality might be at a place in between two locations.

title: 100% necessary!
review:
It has been a Smokey summer and I have a new baby that I want to limit pollution exposure too.
I love being able to see my local area as well as places I’m planning to travel all in once place!

title: Awesome
review: Upon moving out of the USA this app has made it safer for my children (prone to respiratory issues) to go outside! It is easy to use and the updates are great - letting us know when to go out and when to stay in!

title: A brilliant app
review: My cousin usually has acute pneumonia so this app has been very useful. We are able get access to the air quality wherever we go, and avoid unnecessary contact with fine dust.

title: Great to monitor current AQI but useless for everything else
review:
I live in the San Francisco Bay Area and have found the weather and AQI forecasts to be completely useless: they bear no resemblance to reality. 

I do like the setting to display the current AQI on the app icon: very handy to monitor what’s happening due to the wildfire smoke.

I’ve reported some bugs and got a reply very quickly.

title: Good data & map
review: Works quickly & provides hourly data to let you know if you should  just stay indoors! Shows your local reporting site on a map which then allows you to move to see where the air is netter... or worse.

title: More cities
review: I live in Puerto Rico and I wish there was more places cuz all the places they show up I don’t live there at all. Even tho I’m using my location. I even try searching but all the ones they have are not even close where I live. Good app. But needs more places.

title: This is hands down the best
review: I’m an app developer. Not on this app. I’ve tried tons of air quality apps while traveling around the world and I’ve found myself relying on this one most. #1. Get it.

title: Smoke after fires
review:
After the recent fires in the Bay Area I have found the AirVisual App a real help.
No matter where you travel to it gives you up to the minute readings. The numbers and the man’s face & expressions tell it all.

title: Favorite Air quality app!
review: Excellent app that keep me informed about the day’s air quality. I receive a notification of the day in the morning and then can check it easily throughout the day.

title: App review
review: This has been a very helpful tool for me while living in Taiwan. I check the air quality on a daily bases. It has become a part of my life here. It helps me decide what activities to do outdoors and when!

title: Useful information!
review: Information has always been accurate and that’s really helpful for planning ahead, keeping air quality in mind.

title: I love this app
review: I have asthma & this app has helped me to stay current with air quality.  I have a smart watch & so the air quality number comes over my watch & keeps current.  Great app

title: Simple and effective
review: This has been a great app to use while in China. Not only you see the common number but you can see even the smaller pollutants and the trends over time

title: AirVisual is a very informative app
review: Thank you for providing great info about the air quality at almost anywhere in the world! The app is also very easy to use as well! Please keep up the good work!

title: Why this app is great
review: If you live in a country where the air index could also be a political tool then you would be easily understand why such app is more than expected

title: Excellent air quality app
review: This is the best of the air quality apps out there, since the EPA no longer apparently has funding for theirs. This one is very helpful. I highly recommend it for this of us with asthma and environmental allergies.

title: Perfect app for needs
review: This app has been useful with knowing how the air quality is outside. I like how easy it is to navigate and provides me with just enough information.

title: A modern necessity
review: Between wildfires, industrial fires, and increased auto traffic, the air quality where I live has become problematic.  The air quality app has become a best friend.  I use it whenever I plan on outdoor activity.

title: Required to be a responsible parent.
review:
Helps me as a parent of a one year old in Los Angeles stay sane and navigate bad air days. 

Especially love the seven day air quality forecast. Should be standard for all news outlets that report on weather.

title: Helpful
review: Living in countries such as India, we must be very careful with air quality or your health would be negatively affected. This app provides a simple index reflecting the air quality around me telling me whether I should take on a mask. It’s very helpful

title: A must for outdoors enthusiasts in the city!
review: I recently moved to Hong Kong, which is a beautiful city that unfortunately has to contend with pollution a few months out of the year.  It’s really nice using AQI to plan when it’s safe to hike and bike outside, or do a gym day instead.

title: Useful
review: I downloaded this app when we had smoke in town. Now it’s gone, but i still like to know air quality on daily basis. It seems to be accurate and easy to use.

title: Great app for viewing air quality
review: This app is impressive with its accuracy on forecasting the air quality. Definitely recommend installing this app if you want to check the air quality.

title: Informative and easy to use
review: This is a very helpful app, or use it every day, both the information and the graphics are easy to understand.

title: Simple and useful
review:
This app is easy to use, simple to understand, and highly accurate.

It appears to cover most of the counties/cities in the world, not just the U.S.

I very highly recommend this app.

title: AirVisual
review: Great app for those of us having to live with wildfire smoke. It seems accurate and automatically updates. It also gives an air quality forecast.  Easy to use.

title: Good app for bad air
review: The best app for air quality, has a good prediction function which helps you plan your life. Outdoor or indoor? Excellent app, still sad that humanity needs apps like this. Should we not take better care for our planet?

title: Excellent App Valuable Information
review: A wonderful app that provides detailed in the moment information about air quality worldwide. Giving insight into local, regional and seasonal conditions of air quality. A valuable app.

title: Love this
review: Love this app! Super clean, easy to read, informative, especially love the alert notification on the app itself with the number so I don’t have to open the app to be the air quality number .

title: Accurate, helps keep me healthy & works with the IqAir PRO
review: Love that it works with & can control my AirPro, highly recommend both items as well as their home filters! Thank you IQAir! You've got a customer for life.

title: Absolute must-have for China
review: We used this several times a day on our trip to China. Very informative as to whether you will need to wear your mask or not. And interesting to compare different places as well.

title: Helpful app
review: I live in California and with all the fires going on the last few years this app has been so helpful to keep track of the air quality in our area.

title: Allergy sufferer’s best friend
review: This app helps me understand when I’m going to be suffering badly from my allergies. It helps me better prepare for the day ahead. Very happy I found it. Next step I’m going to buy one of their in home machines.

title: Excellent app - add some advanced visualisation
review: Very useful app to track air quality. Would love to see the capability to visualise the data across hours, days and even years where available.

title: Great app to check air quality
review: I really like the app. Like you monitor air quality. Especially useful during fire season when smoke gets trapped in the Bay Area and you know to stay inside.

title: Very Helpful
review: As an expat in Asia, this app helps a lot. I know when to wear my mask out, and when to limit my outdoor activity. It is comprehensive, with many cities listed, and I use it when I travel around Asia too.

title: LOVE THIS APP I USE IT EVERY DAY
review: I check this app just as I do the weather for the day, I live where we frequently have very bad air quality so it helps me in knowing when I need to be wearing a mask. App doesn’t glitch or have any issues.

title: Easy to use, easy to read
review: Everything here just works.  Gives easy color coded maps with easy to look at maps and forecasts.

title: Have severe lung infections bought on by air quality. Having this app has been a life saver
review: Grateful! Feel, much better now that I can be really be careful on days when quality is not that good.

title: Helpful in the Pacific Northwest
review: Our new normal here is summer wildfire season.  This app helps determine my schedule for outdoor activities.  It is easy to use and provides the information on the pollution of particles by size that most directly impacts on health.

title: Dependable
review: No down time.  Quick and easy to read screens.  I’m keeping this app!!  I only wish that more locations could be available(not the fault of the app).

title: Helpful.
review: I have multiple air quality apps on my phone, this one always rates the air the worst. I also have noticed places with good air right next to places with super bad air. I just don’t know how accurate any of these air quality apps are.

title: Essential info, but app has limitations
review: My wife has compromised lungs so knowing this info is important. However, we have been unable to find many localities in their possible choices.

title: Perfect for Beijing
review:
I used to use a different app for the AQI but it became less and less reliable. This one has been so much better. 

More hourly updates than my previous one, accurate and it's all free. Perfect.

title: helps you stay healthy
review:
I use this almost every day. As an asthma patient I can check air quality before going out. During Pacific Coast fire season it is invaluable. 

The previous version let you stack cities in the order you wanted them. Please bring back that functionality.

Thanks.

title: Great Info!
review: It’s great to be able to check AQ with just a click. Shows proof that when cars are off the road we can make a huge difference. If COVID-19 has taught us anything, it’s that fewer emissions mean cleaner air.

title: Excellent app
review: Clear to read and easy to use with an elegant design. Most importantly, the app can show many useful and reliable data. Highly recommend.

title: So helpful
review:
Not only do I get to know the air quality where I am but I can also check the air where my family is!
So important for seniors and people with asthma/lung conditions.

title: Best app so far for checking air quality where I live
review: Very clear and easy to use, and allows you to see reports from multiple stations.

title: Love the app
review: Very helpful specially when you have kids. You can know how the air quality at the city you are about to travel so you can prepare better for your kids!

title: Fantastic App even better with one of their devices
review: I feel a much better knowing my family is safe from the terrible air quality here in Bangkok

title: What my eyes can see, my nose can smell and my lungs can feel.
review: Usually I can look out the window and see that the air is bad for my health, I can often smell the foulness of it. But, knowing what it is comprised of motivates me to remain indoors. I need to move somewhere that has clean air.

title: Great app to go by
review: This app seems to to be accurate. Helps a lot to know what’s going on outside with the air quality. Easy to navigate and has a lot of extra features.

title: Visual excellence in air management
review: Very clear layout and graphics with up to the hour accuracy for air quality. Near term forecasts are very good. This is far superior to the websites which try to accomplish the same task. 5/5 stars.

title: amazing!
review: Provides readings from multiple stations and all the surrounding areas as you move. Essential in helping us find a place w better air quality during the recent CA fires.

title: Amazing info for allergy sufferers like me
review: Being able to keep track of air quality everyday helps me a lot and how to manage my going out of the house

title: Wish it had a legend
review: It’s a great app, but there’s not a convenient legend to tell you what each category means. If you dig around you can find it, but I’d like to see something more readily available so when I see the forecast I have some idea what it means.

title: It’s only been days
review: I’ve only had the app for a few days. So far so good. My only problem is I’d like to have an extended forecast of air quality. Just a few days. If there is, I’m having a hard time navigating my way to finding it.

title: Very good. Widget location selection doesn't work
review: Great app. Just wish the widget feature where you can select which location shows up worked. It always shows nearest location for some reason.

title: Good app for remote areas
review: I live in Kham ta kla. This is the first app that gives more a good idea of air quality. Not sure how they get info on my town but I usually judge air quality by how smoky it is and it seems to reflect that.

title: Breath of fresh air.....so to speak!
review:
Due to my respiratory issues, have a tool to analysis the air quality on a daily basis is important to me! But having a comparative tool where I can watch and compare & contrast multiple cities and locations can be very helpful when traveling and or considering a move! This app/tool allows for all of the above while being formatted to allow for each and concise understanding of the pertinent data!

Thanks so much

JTK
Ashland, OR

title: Super helpful through fire season
review: With young children, it has been amazingly helpful to know when it is safe to go outside before we all start coughing.

title: Love this APP!
review: Living in Northern California, this is my go-to.  During our high fire season, I check the air quality EVERY DAY. Multiple times during active fires. It is very helpful and easy to understand.

title: Great for checking air quality
review: We live in an area that has bad fires in late summer and early fall. It is great to have an app that can give instant information on air quality - thank you!!

title: Thanks for the app
review: Glad I have this as an option to check air quality, especially during fire season.

title: Sincere hope
review:
I like the app,it gives u straight forward details however, i don't see my capital city algiers on the app.
I hope you guys will consider my review and put algiers on your app's radar.

title: Perfect app for air quality we use it everyday and everywhere.
review: Definitely download this app if you want to take care of your health and the health of your whole family.

title: Great App to track the air quality
review: Living in SE Asia it is so helpful to be able to track air quality for keeping your kids healthy and knowing when to exercise indoors instead.

title: Excellent App: Respiratory Disease: Sufferers
review: I check this app. It may help patients who suffer from different respiratory diseases such as Asthma or Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease, for example, Emphysema or Chronic Bronchitis. They should consider its information before going outside and if engaging in physical activity.

title: Outstanding
review: This is my go to app for air-quality readings locally and across the country. With all of the smoke in our area from wildfires, I’m able to plan my outdoor activities by looking at the projections on the app.

title: Pretty good!
review: Really thankful to have this during fire season!  Love how the red notification button shows the air quality number.  AQ predictions more or less seem fairly accurate.

title: Excellent
review: Started using it when wildfire smoke became bad in my city this summer, and have used it daily since. It is a bit geeky, but it's also super interesting to see what's happening both locally and globally.

title: Great app but could use improvement
review: They only update every two hours sometimes and when you live in China, that's not enough. Better location accuracy is needed too. Overall, it's a great so to keep my lungs safe

title: Breathe Easier
review: An easy to use app that nicely displays the necessary information. I especially like the option to choose the sensors that I want pollution readings from.

title: Very Helpful
review: My three month old daughter has a hard time breathing on her own. She requires oxygen assistance when the air quality is bad. This app helps me to know if she’ll need the oxygen or not.

title: Aidaaa
review: The prediction of air in upcoming days is very helpful, also the map and seperation of air quality according to different stations is awesome. I checked it with formal declaration of aor quality and it matched them, so it's very accurate.

title: Help the world with fresh air
review: Thank you for the apps. You tell us know about air quality where we are living. Continue to let everybody know that for their healthy

title: Air quality peace of mind
review: Great app to keep updated on air quality, K liked way better than other apps. Easy to get at a glance air quality info of different locations.

title: Great app
review: Easy to understand, this app has helped me stay safe from harmful airborne pollutants in SE Asia. The scientific data is available to support the apps readings, but it’s also very easy to interpret in a flash. Highly recommend.

title: Really helpful
review: Really easy to use app was critical during a recent visit to South Korea.  Air quality was at a high during the visit and use of the app made early decisions about activities possible.

title: Very Useful
review: I am live in Thailand now, I’m sure you have seen the air problems we are having in Bangkok. This so quickly keeps you up to date on what is going on

title: Super easy and accurate
review: This is just what I was looking for. I wanted a quick way to check and see if bike riding was a good idea with the current air quality.  Very happy with this ap

title: Accurate and convenient
review: Been very reliable in the time I’ve been using it and love that you can compare between other cities at a glance.  Useful for sure!

title: Very helpful
review: I like this app because it does the job but it needs to do very important because California is burning down and people are getting sick from a carcinogenic smoke I recommend this app

title: Useful info
review: Glad to have the info, but the interface is sometimes confusing. Would be nice to have more feedback when things are tapped and more consistent navigation.

title: Awesome!
review: As a chronically ill person, I really rely on knowing information about the air quality. I’ve loved this app and the morning message that lets me know how the air is. The interface is simple to use. Love!

title: My "go to" in Beijing
review: This app is the first thing I check when I wake up.  It's 99% accurate everyday and easy to plan outdoor activities for the future.  It's the best air quality app out there.

title: Thankful parent
review: My daughter has asthma and we have moved to an area effected by inversion. This app gives me the information I need to determine if it is safe for her to play outside or if we need to stay in.

title: Extremely helpful - with a global view !
review: This App is extremely helpful if you are concerned about air quality in your city and also if you are a frequent traveler.

title: Super Helpful App!
review: Especially the notifications — They're like quick air quality weather alerts and forecasts.  Pretty accurate.  Essential for asthma sufferers in the SF Bay Area in Novembers lately, with all the smoky air from forest fires up north.

title: Great info!
review: This app has hourly information about pollution levels, which, in California during fire season, let’s me know if it’s safe to leave the house without a mask. Very grateful this exists!

title: Great features
review: Great app.  The predictive forecast is great, although not completely accurate. It seems as weather changes ability to forecast air quality does as well so you have to take that with a grain of salt

title: Very helpful tool for the times
review: I am so grateful that this exists. It is so hard to deal with all the wildfires and smoke on the west coast and this app really helps know when it’s ok to go outside, whether to use a mask, etc.

title: LilTrigger77
review: This app is extremely helpful for me to assess the risks in venturing out whether I am home or traveling. I highly recommend this app to those of us that have issues related asthma, copd, etc.

title: A Superb App to Keep Abreast of the Dangers of Air Pollution
review: We travel extensively and we use AirVisual to determine which destinations are safe enough to explore. Why would I risk my health to visit a place with a “very Unhealthy” air quality?  This app is our guide.

title: Super useful
review: This app provides multiple cues (color, iconography, text) that make it easy to understand what’s going on. As air quality becomes increasingly varied, I’m glad to have this resource.

title: Great App
review: I never thought I would need this type of app but with the bad air in the Bay Area, it has been helpful as a guide to know the best times to be active or stay indoors. I highly recommend it!
