title: Very helpful
review: Needed to track air quality in our area and this app is making it easier to do that with simple touches of the screen.  Nicely done!

title: BEST air quality app
review: So user-friendly and incredibly helpful for those of us in NorCal dealing with the wildfires. Much better than checking government websites. Especially love the forecast feature.

title: Great Resource and Easy to Use!
review: This app is easy to use and very helpful. My teenage kids actually found it before me. We love in CA with lots of fires and find the updates very helpful. I highly recommend it!

title: So useful
review: These California fires are causing smoke to linger for days. I’m using this app multiple times daily to organize plans with the kids, letting us know when it’s safe to go outside. Such a useful tool!

title: Air quality is important
review: As an asthmatic I need to follow the weather carefully.  I love being able to check it quickly and easily before I go outside or travel.

title: Effective
review: Always updated with the most accurate air quality information.

title: Check it everyday.
review: Living in China, I find AirVisual is a great tool to gauge the air quality. I use it everyday, especially when I’m considering going for a run or thinking about opening a window.

title: i like it
review: It’s super helpful to see the air quality at the moment as well as during the following few hours/days.

title: Loading Error
review: iphone 6 user:  the app opens, shows the circular loading icon, then fails to proceed and becomes stuck with the loading icon.  The loading icon works, though, and watching it circle around and around is all the app seems to be good for right now.
dev_response: Hi, could you please try again? The problem should have disappeared after we tune our server. Please let us know the outcome. Thanks!

title: Essential guide for checking air quality!
review: It’s important to know how clean the air that we breathe is.  With this app you can find out with a tap.  I suffer from allergies, so twice as valuable for me!  Clutch.

title: Excellent Tool for Those with Asthma
review: As I’m traveling my my child, this app has been great to use. He has asthma and allergies so I can check to see if it’s safe for him to be outside and plan our time.

title: Easy for planning trips based on smoke
review: It’s great to be able to easily plan on going outside or for trips with the quick look to the phone

title: Essential
review: We live in an area with occasional poor air quality. This app is essential deciding when to go out, when to open the windows, etc.

title: Amazing
review: This app has helped me get through the 2018 CA fires. It’s live and always up to date. Definitely the go to for any person, and necessary for those with asthma and respiratory problems.

title: The best air quality app! (I checked)
review: I started using this during the California fires. I love the number bubble, so you can check air quality without opening the app.

title: Great app! Get it
review: Really well made and detailed air quality app. Goes hour by hour and gives alerts every morning so you know what the day forecast looks like.

title: Nice to know what your up against.
review: Seems to have solid up-to-date information that you need going in every direction. Easy to understand pollution standards. Good app. Five stars.

title: Air Visual App
review: I love this app! I get an automatic reminder every morning giving me a heads up on what the day ahead is going to look like. It’s also helped me realize the importance of wearing N95 masks outside when gardening or walking the dog.

title: Great Valuable App!!
review: This app has really helped us manage our allergy/asthma issues through a very bad forest fire season.  The app is designed well and provides a great visual along with the incredible data!

title: VERY Helpful
review:
I LOVE this app!  I have allergies AND asthma and I can QUICKLY plan my family’s outdoor activities, by time of day, using this app.
Thank you, for using colors and icons vs having to dig through a lot of text.

title: Helpful app
review: I like to check the air quality readings in my area before going for a run. Recently, however, I’ve been unable to add any new locations; it force-closes when I narrow down my choice of location.

title: Relax and Breathe
review: If you can link to a reliable monitor you can have accurate updates that make daily plans possible.

title: Great for travel in affected areas
review: When I got to Saigon, knowing how awful the air was helped to inform my use of time. I wore a mask. Two weeks later, the air situation improved, and I spent more time outdoors.

title: Helpful app for local air quality
review: This app has been helpful for looking up local air quality - definitely recommend!

title: Extremely Helpful
review: Because of asthma concerns, this app has been a huge help. Living in California with fire danger all around we continually need to monitor air quality. This app lets us do that.

title: Great app, just one request
review: My only request is that to be able to see my favorite places more easily, not have to sort through places far away that I have no interest in.

title: Easy to use
review: App opens quickly, shows relevant information, and allows easily for more detailed data

title: Amazing for aq when I'm going places
review: So before I go to some places I use this app for checking the air quality of the place imma go. And if it's good I go there and if not I wait another time

title: Do I exercise outside today?
review: The website makes my decision on my exercise/ outdoor activities and weekend getaway plan. Forecast could be more accurate (4 stars instead of 5)

title: The news is never good, but it’s good to have the news!
review: This app does a great job of helping us prepare for the AQI day to day. A must have for those living in areas with air quality issues.

title: Eyes on the sky
review: I use this app on a daily basis to check the air quality in Beijing. Thank you for the data that helps me make decisions like whether or not to take a walk or put on a pollution mask.

title: Use it everyday (live in Taiwan)
review: Useful data, but the forecasts are not. Be sure to set settings to the US aqi and not CN aqi (which is China). China’s standards are LOW which is misleading to anyone who thinks they are safe. I’m surprised AirVisual even offers CN as an option.

title: Super helpful during the fires
review: With all of the recent wildfires in California, I used this app daily to monitor air quality for myself and family members in other areas. So simple to use!

title: Works great! Very convenient to have readings on my phone.
review: The title pretty much says it all. Might be nice to always have 7 day forecast open, but maybe that’s a server load thing.

title: Great access to Air Quality info
review: Refreshes fast and often - it’s easy to track the air quality and know when you need a mask. I particularly like the map

title: Nice job
review: Almost no ads and perfectly designed interface! Really makes checking air quality a breeze. Thanks!

title: Getting better
review:
When I first downloaded the app the locations they measured were limited. But it’s gotten better and I’m finding lots more locations now. Much better and more accurate coverage now.

Breath is life

title: Great app!
review: I got the app because I was concerned about wildfire smoke. It’s easy to add and remove locations and gives a 7 day forecast that reports incoming smoke long before the local news did.

title: Love AirVisual
review: Great App. I use it to plan bike rides. It also helps with wind velocity, valuable info during rides. Also, we have a whole house fan, data here helps me determine when to open windows to cool house vs using AC

title: Invaluable for these Southern OR fires
review: Going through a few weeks of unhealthy air and I’ve used this app many times each day to monitor air quality

title: Great App!
review: It is so easy to use. With the active eruption on the Big Island of Hawaii, it helps us know if we need to close up the house or if it is safe to get fresh air. Helps me keep my family safe! Fantastic!

title: Air Visual
review: I have a terminal pulmonary disease. Every morning I know what to expect on how I can breath. The app sends push messages telling you what to expect in air quality. Every one in my support group loves it too. Great app

title: Great app for your health
review: Just got it the other day so hope it continues to work as well as it has. Bought the indoor device too that IQ Air sells. So afar, OUTSTANDING. But the juries still out. Can’t put a price tag on your health!

title: This has been a long smoky summer
review: AirVisual has been a great resource this summer as we have dealt with horrible air quality.  Luckily, the weather is turning colder and wetter so air is much better. But keeping the app!  Thanks

title: Very helpful
review: I use this application throughout the day. I was recently diagnosed with asthma so I check the air quality before I do any outdoor activities. THANK YOU for making this app!!!

title: Such a wonderful app
review: It is so great to have this for us here in Cairo where air quality isn’t always so great.  It is nice to know which days to run outside and which days to stay indoors.

title: Amazing app
review: Convenient to use. During the season of high air pollution in my country this app showed me what regions I should not go to and how long the pollution is gonna last. 5 stars from me

title: My new obsession
review: This app is easy to use but you can go deeper as you desire. Been using it on the hour to plan our day/travels/etc especially as the fires rage on here in California.

title: Super helpful
review: Thanks to this app I’m be able to protect myself and my family from the air pollution. Really appreciate your hard work to provide such a helpful application.

title: Breathless
review: I wish I’d found you sooner. Moved to a new state. Been here 3 months now having a full blown asthma episode. I will check your app often. Now I  can plan my outdoor time.

title: A lot of useful info
review: Not only the general pmi for your city but you can also check out the whole world map love to see whats going on

title: This is super handy
review: This app is so handy. It shows you the air quality of your city, and it even shows the whole world! If you are looking for a good beach area with good air quality, this app is the best!!!!!!!!!!!!😃

title: Need to access records
review:
It would be great if this service also provided past records of the air quality.

There does not seem to be any information stored.

title: Thankful for this App
review: My family has severe allergies and Asthma and knowing the air quality help us prepared for the day.  Thank you for this daily information my family and I are greatly appreciative. 👍🏼👌🏼

title: Great app

air quality scores

Now, six months later AFTER California's fires...ALL PREVIOUSLY BAD #'s ARE NOW GOOD😶🌊knock me down with a sneaker wave...😳still rely on its values: CAUSE ITS ALL I HAVE, SEEMS HINKY TO REBOOT/CHANGE VALUES😶🚬🤷‍♀️🤢

Since iOS 13.3, when you tap on the notification, the app opened for 1 second and it crashed immediately. So the primary functions of notifying you is broken. 

Unfortunately, the dev has no way to contact them to report bug. So now I have a broken app for a $250 device.

title: Helpful air quality information for indoor and outdoor
review: Very interesting to see the air quality details change within your home and learn the why behind the data. The iq air quality monitor makes this app even better by providing different recommendations to improve your specific indoor AQi and when necessary, recommendations for keeping outdoor air out by closing windows, etc. This app, however, provides far more information than the iq aqi monitor alone so have more information available to compare current aqi with historical trends as well as current aqi in other cities you may be considering for future travels. I’ve recently changed the destination of our summer vacation based on the aqi information provided for Indonesia. I don’t want to expose our child to the air pollution for such an extended period of time. It really is very enlightening information to have at your fingertips. I really wish the CA school systems actively used this data available on the app at the very least, and at best both the aqi monitoring devices with the app to make more informed decisions about outdoor activities and when its best to limit young children and sensitive students to indoor activities to avoid exposure to the outdoor air pollution when aqi data is highest indicating poor air quality. The aqi data monitor could also help schools assess individual school locations and any need for improved ventilation or air purification systems within specific schools and/or districts. Thank you for making this data publicly accessible for all! Air quality is so important and often an overlooked space when assessing cause and effect with concerning health issues. I think this information being public can only  help encourage all countries to make improving air quality a priority. I hope more people start accessing and using this information to help guide their travels where the air is clean and safe for all, as well as encourage all of us to continue making efforts to improve our air quality and reduce air pollution starting with our own home energy usage. Please keep advancing research and technology! It is greatly appreciated!

title: LOVE IT!!
review: This app is super informative and user friendly. I don't really like the design, but after downloading a million different air quality apps, I finally found one I love. Some of the news pieces are really interesting, and I'm pretty sure this is one of the only apps to provide a weather and air pollution forecast. Two thumbs up!

title: Has Potential and could use some improvement
review: This app has a lot of potential. Better reporting and verifying g of data would be good (Salt Lake City is consistently reported better than it actually is). Also being able to create a list of the top (worst air quality) 5 or 10 cities in a state, region, or country would be useful.  And being able to chart trends or list how many days at a certain air quality in the past month or year would be nice.

title: Love this app
review: I love that this app has real time air and weather along with the forecast.  I need to check the air frequently living in Beijing with kids and being to check air and weather at the same time is an awesome feature.  Also, I like the comparison of AQI to other cities in the world.

title: Pretty smart AQI app
review: This app gets it.  They offer everything you want to know from an air quality app – live monitoring, forecasts, news, US Embassy ratings, world coverage. Boom.  I trust this over any Chinese source.  Real great potential!  Looking forward to the next update for enhanced features and reduced lag. Slap. That. Big. Ole. Bass.

title: Pretty good user-friendly app
review: Pretty good air quality app for surviving in polluted cities.  The forecast feature is nifty - helps me plan when I want to be out and about.  Definitely would recommend to others!

title: Almost Useful
review: The type of information provided and the user interface are great, but the data is not real time. It is always 3-4 hours delayed. You can get a general idea of how the day is going, but air quality can change quickly, so really all this tells you is what it was like the last time you were out. 😐

title: Amazing
review: Really amazing app, gives you the information you need in a really simple way. I think more people need to buy and use monitors to increase its accuracy, but the app itself is perfect

title: Clean and clear
review: I like it because it is so simple and visual. I like being able to display three locations at once, including mixes of international cities.

title: China
review: Was in China for a week. App indications seemed to match apparent air quality. There were many locations to get a average of air quality. I didn't see too many locals wearing a mask on bad days. Was also a holiday week, so maybe a lot of out of towners.

title: Great!
review: For those who frequently travel – or are interested in exploring air quality in different cities – this app is awesome.  Super informative – and the news section is pretty unique

title: Like it!
review: I’ve tried a few air quality apps, this is my favorite.  I have it on all of my devices.  Particularly useful - the air quality forecast.

title: Very helpful
review: I really like this app, most of the time. I appreciate the visuals and all the various locations. I wish the predictor was more accurate, but I suppose that's impossible to predict correctly all the time.

title: Great app for traveling
review: Great app to have as a frequent traveler: contains up to date air quality information and useful as a warning if you need to take preventative measures.

title: Useful
review: Real user friendly app with great coverage in the US - particularly useful for traveling in Asia.  Pro-tip: If you refresh the station database you can get coverage in 20 countries.

title: Great app!
review: I love this app! Very user friendly and easy to understand. I highly recommend it for anyone living in a city and concerned about health risks of pollution.

title: Airvisual
review: I have a 96 year old father. Air quality is extremely important. This program is invaluable to us.

title: Good air quality
review: I like it because i can check air quality where I live.

title: Super keen near bodacious tubular app
review: There are some cool features on the AirVisual app that make it stand out – notably the forecast, global coverage and news section.  A solid download for an AQI app.

title: Awesome AQI app
review: It’s really easy to use – and informative for people who don’t know too much about air quality.

title: Great app
review: I live in Korea and this app works very well for our area. It's nice to know when the air quality is good or not.

title: Bad App
review: The info is inaccurate. My location had a green and yellow face past 2 days and we have had a orange Air Quality alert. Says is 39 and nearest station says 60. Worse than no info is wrong info. My lungs were not lying to me but this App was. Seems App only exists to sell/finance Node product. Shame on you!

title: I liked it ...

title: Đánh giá
review: Tôi đánh giá ứng dụng này 1* vì như lời ông thầy Vũ Khắc Ngọc sống tại Việt Nam, nói là ứng dụng này làm ra nhằm đánh giá sai chỉ số ô nhiễm về Hà Nội và TP Hồ Chí Minh, với mục đích bán được càng nhiều càng tốt máy lọc không khí của công ty mẹ AQI. Nếu AQI không đính chính lại và hùa theo ông thầy Vũ Khắc Ngọc thì ứng dụng này còn bị vote 1* dài dài.

title: Thank you & sorry from Viet Nam
review:
Cảm ơn các bạn đã đem đến cho chúng tôi một thông tin trung thực về ô nhiễm không khí để giúp người dân chúng tôi có thể tự bảo vệ sức khoẻ của mình và gia đình của mình.

Chúng tôi xin lỗi các bạn vì đã có nhiều đối tượng là người của chế độ lãnh đạo đã không biết lắng nghe và giúp người dân khắc phục ô nhiễm môi trường khi app của các bạn report là ô nhiễm mà lại đi phá các bạn, chúng tôi gọi lũ người đó là “ lũ bò đỏ” nó là một lũ ngu như bò.

title: Đánh giá mức độ ô nhiễm bằng ứng dụng Airvisual
review: Tôi tin tưởng vào các đánh giá về không khí tại Hà Nội của công ty các bạn. Tôi cho rằng ứng dụng Airvisual thật sự có ích và giúp mọi người nhận ra mặt trái của những đô thị thiếu sự quản lý và điều hành minh bạch. Tất nhiên, các bạn là tiên phong nên sự chống đối sẽ đến từ khắp nơi, từ doanh nghiệp và cả những quan chức thiếu trách nhiệm với cộng đồng. Dẫu có thế, sự ủng hộ các bạn sẽ tăng lên theo thời gian nếu các bạn giữ được sự bình tĩnh và kiên định. Chúc các bạn thành công, hy vọng chúng tôi cũng sẽ có được bầu không khí sạch hơn. Cảm ơn các bạn rất nhiều.

title: Easy to read. Interesting to view other cities & parts of the world !
review:
I was living in Grants Pass Oregon for just 2 years, 2016-2018
The smoke during “fire season” (May-Oct) is the worst air quality practically of our nation. 
I was able to compare to New Delhi which is absolutely horrible air quality !!
I promised myself I would not have my summers robbed from me again because of this poor air quality in Grants Pass Oregon. 
Air Visual really guided me through this uncertain experience. 
The air quality was so poor it was advised to limit my outdoor activities. 
I recently left Oregon  & went back to my hometown of San Diego Ca to help family. 
Best decision I ever made.

title: Great app
review: The app is great and informative yet would be better if there was a closer sensor. Nearest sensor is two cities away. Sensor only detects one location indoors or outdoors so you can’t do both and at 250.00 a pop it’s discouraging. Maybe a discount if you buy two and make the second sensor an outside weather station.

title: Forecast ALWAYS Inaccurate, Now Current Inaccurate Too!
review: Like some other reviewers, I got this app specifically for the forecast feature only to find that it predicts poor air quality every day. There’s something very wrong with the app. Is it a bug? There are two separate sets of differing forecasts for the current day. WHY? It makes absolutely NO SENSE. It seems whomever is plugging data in is just guessing. I can do better than that by simply looking and smelling the air! It’s completely useless. I live in Oregon and have asthma so I depend on accurate forecasts to plan my days. Well, I can’t, nor should you, at least not with this app. I use LRAPA.org and AirMatters app for this. They give at least some forecast for the next day with a level of accuracy. Perhaps your developers can look into this problem. Until you fix this, this app is useless. I can’t trust that even the current conditions are accurate. The last straw was waking up to it saying the AQI is 91 when, in reality, it’s 21. Deleted.

title: Aqi at it best
review:
AQI readings at their best, I like app notifications at a glance of the current readings and by zip code.
  Also, nice to know why I’m feeling poorly and when to spend more time under filtered air indoors as needed. 
 Thank you Air Visual.

title: Forecast information not updated
review: I love the graphics and they way this app displays information, but the current air quality index will be accurate and they won't have updated the 3-hour trajectory forecast below. So the forecast could say 51-100 (yellow) for several three hour makes through the day and the current reading will be 155 (red). They don't even update the trajectory forecast before you pass the time mark and it disappears from the timeline.

title: Good product
review: Easy to read and understand. Visually pleasing. I have verified the in-home pm2.5, temp, and humidity readings with other monitors. Maintains a clear and useful history by day, hour and moth, easy to read. Includes external community monitoring station results. Unfortunately, for unknown reasons, the latter is always 2 hours older than the continuous internal monitoring of the node. Therefore one cannot make clear inferences regarding the source of in-home contamination from the data displayed on the Node alone. Fortunately, EPA has an app, AirNow, that provides local outside AQI (by zip code) that is an hour or less old. This supplements the node and gives better perspective on relative AQI, without having to take the node outdoors every time one wants to compare. My Node went on the fritz once in February. Several calls to the company resulted in learning that the pm2.5 sensor can occasionally get a particle lodged inside that blocks its continuous monitoring ability. They informed me that this is easily corrected by a blast or two from a can of  compressed air. It worked, and the problem has not recurred in the approximately 5 months I have been using the Node.

title: Has Potential
review: I got this app a few weeks ago because it seemed like the only one not concentrating not just China. I also got sick of checking aqicn.org when I needed an air quality update. The reason I say it has potential is that until recently it's worked flawlessly. For the last 24 hrs it's been un-updated. I'm currently residing in Sasebo Japan, where it turns out they don't inform you before you arrive, you get tons of crappy pollution from China in the form of PM 2.5. I have a 9 mos old son and a 5 yr old I'm trying to keep from developing childhood asthma. That's why air quality is so important to me. Hope they can work out the bugs!!
